messages.content: ComfyUI Line Counter is a custom node package designed to streamline workflow by providing powerful file-counting capabilities.
What are the main features of ComfyUI Line Counter?
The main features of ComfyUI Line Counter include the ability to count the number of lines in any text file easily and count the number of files in a directory efficiently.
How can one install ComfyUI Line Counter?
Installation can be done by either cloning the repository into the `custom_nodes` folder or installing via the ComfyUI Manager.
What are the usage steps for ComfyUI Line Counter?
To use ComfyUI Line Counter, one must add the nodes to their workflow, configure necessary parameters, and restart the server.
How can one contribute to ComfyUI Line Counter?
Contribution is welcomed. Individuals can contribute by creating an issue or submitting a pull request for suggested improvements or fixing bugs.
What is the purpose of the 'Text File Line Counter' node?
The 'Text File Line Counter' node is used to count the number of lines in any text file.
What is the purpose of the 'Directory File Counter' node?
The 'Directory File Counter' node is used to count the number of files in a directory.
